analysis.description:
Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#306-325) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#320-321)

Slot.awardPrizes has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[winnerIndex + i].transfer(prizes[i]) (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#376)

Reentrancy in Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#306-325):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#320-321)
	External calls sending eth:
	- addParticipant(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#321-322)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- counter (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#321-322)
	- gameNumber (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#321-322)
	- jackpot (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#321-322)
	- participants (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#321-322)

SlotTicket.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#247-248)
SlotTicket.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#246-247)
SlotTicket.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#248)
SlotTicket.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#248-249)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x20d7d4b07a2dcefe1bd99ac11eae2f5a8218e454.sol#354-355:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
